subject: Soccer
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Mano Menezes became the new coach of Brazil’s national soccer team Saturday, one day after the first choice, Muricy Ramalho, turned down the job because of his contract with the Brazilian club Fluminense
snippet: Mano Menezes became the new coach of Brazil’s national soccer team Saturday, one day after the first choice, Muricy Ramalho, turned down the job because of his contract with the Brazilian club Fluminense
